kjv_def: abide, behave self, have conversation, live, overthrow, pass, return, be used
strongs_def: to overturn; also to return; by implication, to busy oneself, i.e. remain, live
outline:
1. to turn upside down, overturn
  2. to turn back
  3. to turn hither and thither, to turn one's self about, sojourn dwell in a place
  4. metaph. to conduct one's self, behave one's self, live
